author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Since the gas limit can only change by so much per block, the rollout in my proposal would be gradually as well

author: funnygiulio
content: I mean yours is not automatic (if it is - then it is just like mine). that is a big important difference, it adds  a lot of iteration time

author: funnygiulio
content: btw the way the gradual increase is done is just an implementation detail - the point is that it is automatic and reduces friction - also if you do it while not making automatic the underlying mechanism is still exponential. also overall a slope should always be better than steps because less damage occurs in the worst case and if there needs to be a rollout it does not need to be an emergency.

author: potuz
content: No, it's exponential vs linear. We can argue that it's fine to do it exponential as long as it's a minor change, but the fact is that linear will always be a smoother change
